snippet.title: Magicka 2 - A Free Update - Learn to spell again... AGAIN!
snippet.description:
Get Magicka 2 here: http://ter.li/0lu40v

Paradox Interactive, a publisher of games that are often misspelled, today released a free update to Magicka 2 which includes an overhaul of the game’s iconic spellcasting system. Magicka 2, a game that teaches “with great power comes zero responsibility,” now includes three additional elements to include in spells, added for free to further empower friendship-ending team-killing accidents. The new spell system arrives today on Windows PC, and will appear very soon for the PlayStation®4 computer entertainment system.

Get Magicka 2 here: http://ter.li/0lu40v
